Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago White Sox swept the Los Angeles Angels 3-2, 4-3, and 7-0 in their previous series.
The White Sox lost 4-1 on Friday with three hits and two errors.
Sean Burke will start for the White Sox with a 1-0 record and a 1.93 ERA in three games.
The Tigers swept the Tampa Bay Rays with wins of 2-1, 7-1, and 4-3.
The Tigers had seven team hits in their win on Friday.
Beau Brieske will start for the Tigers with a 4-4 record and a 3.56 ERA.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Eight of the White Sox's last nine games have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Six of the last seven games between the White Sox and Tigers at Comerica Park have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The Tigers' last nine day games against AL opponents have seen the 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market hit.
The White Sox's last six road games have seen the 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market hit.
Matt Vierling has recorded a Double in each of his last three appearances against the White Sox.
Kerry Carpenter has recorded at least one Single in each of his last six appearances against AL Central opponents with a losing record.
Javier Baez has hit a home run in two of his last three home appearances with the Tigers against AL opponents.
Riley Greene has recorded two or more total bases in each of his last seven home appearances against the White Sox after playing the previous day.
Colt Keith has recorded at least one RBI in five of the Tigers' last six games against AL Central opponents with a losing record.
Andrew Benintendi has recorded an RBI in three of his last four appearances against AL opponents.
Andrew Vaughn has recorded at least one hit in each of his 10 previous Saturday appearances against AL Central teams with a winning record.
Yoan Moncada has recorded a Double in six of his last eight appearances in day games against AL Central teams with a winning record.
Luis Robert has scored a run in four of his last five appearances in day games.
